text:
Welcome to a choose-your-own-adventure game made by Carl, where you get to have fun (hopefully) and also learn some chemistry along the way (also hopefully)!

This game is interactive; type your response in the box below and hit enter.

Sometimes, you will be asked a question with multiple choices given; to respond, input the number next to your desired choice. For example, if the options are '1. banana, 2. apple, 3. orange' and you would like to answer 'banana', type '1'.

If you are asked to respond with a word/phrase, make sure it is lowercase and spelled correctly. If you are typing a long response, capitalize as you please.

If you wish to skip the typing animation, hit the 'Enter' key again.

If at any point you wish to see a list of commands or how to format your answer, type 'help'.

Typing 'outline' will generate an outline of content; you can skip to the section you wish.

If you wish to take back your answer, type 'undo'. Note that this works only for the previous answer; you cannot undo more than that (as of right now).

The game will display previous prompts, for your reference. If you wish to print it out, just hit Ctrl+P or Cmd+P (for Mac).

Type anything to start from the beginning.
this is div 2, frq, ans = hi
this is div 4, links to div 6
this is div 6, links to div 5
